alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 1:33PM MST until January 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Lolo Pass and Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
